channel.title: Fbob Academic Pages
channel.description: Recent content on Fbob Academic Pages

item.description:
My name is Fran√ßois Beaubert, I’m an Assistant Professor in Fluid Mechanics at INSA Hauts de France and LAMIH lab.

  • My research interests include turbulence modelization, turbulence control, heat and mass transfer.
  • I teach Fluid Mechanics, Numerical method in Fluid mechanics, Turbulence modelization and Aeroacoustics.
